EmailTemplate.name: Marvel Instructions
EmailTemplate.subject: Marvel Digital Comics Subscription Instructions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on receiving your free Marvel subscription! Marvel Digital Comics Unlimited is a subscription service to over 9,000 digital comics and 400 completed series. You’ll find digital comics from every era and all of our top characters: Spider-Man, Iron Man, X-Men, Thor, Captain America, Fantastic Four, and many more super heroes. With your subscription, you will receive instant access to Marvel’s online library. Discover new characters today!
Here are the instructions to claim your Marvel subscription:
1. Click on this link: http://marvel.com/digital_comics/unlimited 2. Click the “Subscribe Now” button 3. Enter the promo code “IAVA2010” and click “Apply Promo.” You should see your subscription package value at $0. 4. Read and fill out the rest of the checkout page to convert your free annual subscription to Marvel Digital Comics!
If you need any assistance, please email marveldigitalpromo@sunbeltfs.com. Please note that this is 100% off the annual subscription fee of $59.88. The limited time 100% off promo applies to the first year of annual subscription only; subsequent years will be billed at the regular price. This offer is valid for new subscriptions only and is not valid for gift subscriptions. For further details, terms, and conditions, please go to http://marvel.com/unlimited/digital_comics.
We hope you enjoy your subscription. Be sure to visit therucksack.org again to see what else is available in your area.
If you have any questions, please refer to the FAQ at http://rucksack.iava.org/dc_FAQ.
Thank you for supporting IAVA and Happy Holidays!
